key.name: base-path
key.summary: Extension base path to locate resources
key.description: The absolute filesystem path to the installed extension folder. Used for locating internal resources like icons and schemas.

key.name: icon-theme
key.description: The name of the icon theme to use for the extension's buttons and indicators. For example: "adwaita", "papirus".

key.name: proc-mon-enabled
key.description: Enable or disable real-time processor usage monitoring.

key.name: proc-btn-enabled
key.description: Enable or disable the CPU usage button in the quick settings menu.

key.name: mem-mon-enabled
key.description: Enable or disable real-time memory usage monitoring.

key.name: mem-btn-enabled
key.description: Enable or disable the memory usage button in the quick settings menu.

key.name: bat-btn-styled
key.description: Apply custom styling to the battery button in the quick settings area.

key.name: scs-btn-hidden
key.description: Remove the screenshot button from the quick settings menu.

key.name: stn-btn-hidden
key.description: Remove the settings button from the quick settings menu.

key.name: lck-btn-hidden
key.description: Remove the lock screen button from the quick settings menu.
